title: Benghuai: Xing Qiong Tiedao - Taiping Lin Xin Sui

alternative_titles.en: Honkai: Star Rail - Harmony Greets the New Year
alternative_titles.ja: 《崩坏：星穹铁道》动画短片：「太平临新岁」

synopsis:
A new year dawns and prosperity beckons. In a certain corner of the Exalting Sanctum, Master Gongshu and his two assistants are consumed by preparations for the Xianzhou's New Year performance.

(Source: YouTube)
